Recently, Hupu APP launched various scoring functions, so netizens went to the Hundred Family Surnames page to give "Xi" 1 star.
After that, Hupu urgently hid the character "Xi", so netizens went to give "Diao" 1 star again.

content: It is reported that in the past two days, many people who participated in the protest on Urumqi Middle Road in Shanghai last year were called by the police to take statements. Their mobile phones were also checked to see if there were any sensitive group chats, whether they planned to gather in the next two days, etc.

Netizen contribution
"Chengdu Wangping Street 20221127"
An eyewitness of the white paper movement on Chengdu Wangping Street on the night of November 27 last year witnessed the whole process of people mourning the Urumqi fire from gathering around, shouting slogans together to being violently cleared out.
He made this video and hopes that more people can see it.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On November 25, the Shenzhen Longgang Branch issued a police report and suspended the police officer in question from performing his duties.
Regarding the local police station's response that "the video was played in fragments with the beginning and the end cut off", I believe that this video fully shows the process of the police officer's violent law enforcement on the drunk man who had been subdued, and it was not cut off.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In this regard, netizens have two different opinions. Some people think that the policeman should be fired, while others support the policeman.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On November 24, at Yuanpei Experimental School in Shunde District, Foshan City, Guangdong Province, workers hung banners on the roof of the unfinished teaching building of the school to demand their wages.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, in the mobile game "Ni Shui Han", a player used methods such as changing the color of a fashion item in the game and adding a mustache to the character to COS Japanese military uniforms in the game, which aroused discussion among netizens.
On November 25, the mobile game Ni Shui Han issued an announcement to permanently ban several players.
It is reported that the players whose accounts were banned had recharged more than 150,000 yuan per person.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
November 24, Dongguan, Guangdong.
A suspected restaurant employee exposed the chaos in the kitchen, with rats running around and garbage piled up in the video. The person who filmed it said, "We sell 30,000 on weekends, and we have to queue up. The food is delicious."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On November 24, a user named Xiang Dongliang reported Hu Xijin's illegal circumvention of the Great Firewall to Ping An Beijing on Weibo under his real name. On November 25, his account was banned.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of November 24 in Shanghai, a netizenâ€™s dashcam captured a man walking naked under the Oriental Pearl Tower.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On November 23, in Shenzhen, Guangdong, a video of a boy crying in front of a surveillance camera because his grandfather bit his arm and scolded him for washing dishes slowly attracted widespread attention and heated discussion from netizens.
From the video, we can see that when the boy saw his grandfather pick up a stick, he was immediately frightened and trembling.
Not only that, the grandfather also scolded the boy: You will be a scumbag when you grow up! 1
On January 24, the boy's father, Mr. Hu, responded: The boy is 10 years old this year. Because he and his wife work in other places, the child can only live with his grandfather, and the child's grandfather is dissatisfied with him and his wife, so he took his anger out on the child. 
In another recording of the boy's call with his father, the boy cried to his father that he was beaten with a stick by his grandfather, and his arm was bitten by his grandfather. He even threatened to kill himself with a kitchen knife.
When the boy was talking to his father, he could still hear his grandfather roaring from time to time.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Migrant workers who have not found jobs are seen outside Kunshan Railway Station in Jiangsu Province on November 24.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently in Shandong, a man named "Ling Qing" posted a video saying that he had a China Unicom mobile phone card. Because the package fee was too high (260 yuan per month), he applied to China Unicom to reduce the package fee, but was rejected.
Ling Qing then complained to the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, but what he waited for was not a notice of fee reduction, but a naked threat from China Unicom. Ling Feng said that the local China Unicom company contacted his village cadres and relatives to put pressure on him and threatened to sue him if he did not remove the video.
As of the time of posting, Ling Qing's video complaining about China Unicom has been deleted.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
November 24, Yantai City, Shandong Province.
A woman posted a video saying that since her legal house was demolished and she petitioned, she has always been followed by plainclothes police, regardless of wind, rain, cold or heat.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On November 24, an explosion occurred at an enterprise near Wuliyuan Township, Wuxiu County, Jiaozuo City, Henan Province. The sky was filled with orange smoke and there was a pungent smell in the air. The accident is currently under further investigation.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On November 25, at the Sky City Mall in Changchun, Jilin, the Gymboree Early Childhood Education Center ran away. A large number of parents gathered at the mall and held banners to protest their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On November 25, some self-media revealed that the Beihuan Road Police Station of the Qinhuangdao Haigang Branch issued a notice to copy shops in its jurisdiction, requiring that any banners or slogans concerning the rights of soldiers be reported to the police station.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On November 21, 2023, in Shiqiaozhai New Village, Ninger Town, Ninger Hani Autonomous County, Puer City, Yunnan Province, a retired teacher adopted more than 400 stray dogs in his yard. All of them were killed by law enforcement. The law enforcement department sold the dogs that were not killed to dog meat restaurants at 28 yuan per kilogram.
His yard was also razed to the ground on the same day.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Contribution from an employee of Xi'an BYD Huxian Caotang Factory
The factory prohibits employees from using mobile phones, but there is no prohibition for other staff except employees
And there are strict regulations and requirements for employees. Employees work 12 hours a day, but they can only drink water, smoke, and go to the bathroom three times a day, and each time is no more than ten minutes.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Taoist priests are the party, please rest assured
On November 25, a Taoist priest in Huiji District, Zhengzhou, posted a video on a self-media platform showing him and his fellow Taoists studying government documents together.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Night in Urumqi"
On November 25th a year ago, after more than 100 days of city-wide lockdown, Urumqi, the provincial capital city with the highest level of stability in the country, took the lead in the first large-scale protest in the city during the epidemic.
In the end, the people rushed into the division headquarters building holding national flags in exchange for the city leaders' promise to lift the lockdown tomorrow.
The whole process is included in the website.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The short film "Memo", which records the epidemic in Shanghai, won the Best Documentary Short Film at the 60th Golden Horse Awards.
